Ember.Application.initializer({
    name:'CalendarSourceEventsLogMixin',
    after: ['EventUtils', 'CustomfilterlistMixin'],
    initialize: function(container, application) {
        var eventUtil = container.lookupFactory('utility:event');
        var Mixin = container.lookupFactory('factory:mixin');

        var get = Ember.get,
            set = Ember.set,
            isNone = Ember.isNone,
            moment = window.moment;

        /**
         * This is the calendar source eventlog mixin.
         * This mixin is only available for the widget calendar
         *
         * @mixin calendarsourceeventlog
         */
        var mixin = Mixin('calendarsourceeventslog', {
            init: function() {
                this._super();

                //TODO REMOVE!! --- Actually needful to get the customfilterlist
                set(this, 'rights', {list_filters: {checksum: true}});
                set(this, 'elEvents', []);
            },

            /**
             * Rerender events log when the calendar view is refreshed
             * @method renderEventLog
             */
            renderEventLog: function () {
                var controller = this;

                if (!isNone(get(controller, 'model.selected_filter.filter'))) {
                    controller.removeEventLog();
                    controller.getMixinFilter();
                }
            },

            /**
             * Give a formated filter to apply to the redirection
             * @method formatFilterForWidgetList
             * @param {number} start timestamp
             * @return {string} filter
             */
            formatFilterForWidgetList: function (start) {

                var startDay = moment(start).startOf('day');
                var endDay = moment(start).startOf('day').add(1, 'd');

                //TODO @fdemeulenaere create a property on the mixin dict, in order to comment it, and notify the presence of this property to future readers
                var description = get(this, 'descriptionFilter');

                var query;
                if (isNone(description)) {
                    query = {};
                }
                else {
                    query = JSON.parse(description);
                }

                var filter = JSON.stringify({
                    '$and': [
                        query,
                        {
                            'timestamp': {
                                '$gte': parseInt(startDay.format('X')),
                                '$lte': parseInt(endDay.format('X'))
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                });

                return filter;
            },

            /**
             * Redirect to the event-history view, with given eventlog and filter
             * @method goToInfo
             * @param {String} filter selected filter
             * @param {Object} element element concerned by the filter
             */
            goToInfo: function (filter, element) {

                var transition = this.transitionToRoute('/userview/view.event-history');

                eventUtil.applyVolatileFilter(transition, element, filter);

            },

            /**
             * This method is called every time the selected filter is changed.
             * Get the user filter created thanks to the customfilterlist mixin (method computeFilterFragmentList).
             * Then, call loadEventsLog method to query events related to this filter.
             * @method getMixinFilter
             */
            getMixinFilter: function() {
                this._super();
                var controller = this;

                controller.getDateCalendarView();
                this.computeFilterFragmentsList();

                if (!isNone(get(controller, 'titleFilter'))) {
                    var promises = [controller.loadEventsLog()];
                    controller.onSourceLoad(promises, ['reDrawEventLog']);
                }

            }.observes('model.selected_filter'),

            /**
             * Remove eventlog from calendar
             * @method removeEventLog
             */
            removeEventLog: function () {
                var controller = this;
                var elEvents = get(controller, 'elEvents');
                controller.trigger('removeEventCalendar', elEvents[0]);
                elEvents = [];
                set(controller, 'elEvents', elEvents);
            },

            /**
             * Display current eventlog on the fullcalendar
             * @method reDrawEventLog
             * @param {controller} controller
             */
            reDrawEventLog: function (controller) {
                var elEvents = get(controller, 'elEvents');
                controller.trigger('addEventCalendar', elEvents[0]);
            },

            /**
             * Get eventlog from calendarday collection
             * @method loadEventsLog
             * @return {promise} promise
             */
            loadEventsLog: function(){
                var controller = this;
                var store = get(controller, 'widgetDataStore'),
                    elEvents = get(controller, 'elEvents');

                controller.getDateCalendarView();

                var mongoQuery = get(controller, 'descriptionFilter');

                var eventsLogParams = {};
                if (mongoQuery === '' || isNone(mongoQuery)) {
                    eventsLogParams = {
                        tstart: get(controller, 'calendarStart'),
                        tstop: get(controller, 'calendarEnd'),
                        limit: 100
                    };
                } else {
                    eventsLogParams = {
                        tstart: get(controller, 'calendarStart'),
                        tstop: get(controller, 'calendarEnd'),
                        limit: 100,
                        select: mongoQuery
                    };
                }

                var promise = store.findQuery('calendarday', eventsLogParams).then(function (result) {
                    var contentsCount = get(result, 'content');
                    var countlength = contentsCount.length,
                        calendarTab = [];

                    for (var i = 0; i < countlength; i++) {
                        var count = get(contentsCount[i], 'count');
                        var date = get(contentsCount[i], 'date');

                        if(count !== 0) {
                            var formated_eventsLogCount = controller.getEventsLogCount(count, date);
                            calendarTab.pushObject(formated_eventsLogCount);
                        }
                    }

                    var color = get(controller, 'bgcolor_eventlog');
                    var textColor = get(controller, 'textcolor_eventlog');
                    elEvents.pushObject({
                        name: get(controller, 'titleFilter'),
                        events: calendarTab,
                        color: color,
                        textColor: textColor
                    });
                    set(controller, 'elEvents', elEvents);

                });

                return promise;
            },

            /**
             * Override the mixin's computeFilterFragmentsList method
             * @method computeFilterFragmentsList
             * @return {Array}
             */
            computeFilterFragmentsList: function() {
                var controller = this;
                var elEvents = get(controller, 'elEvents');
                var filter = get(this, 'model.selected_filter');

                console.log('the selected_filter', filter);
                // if no filter is selected, we return []
                if (!isNone(filter)) {
                    // if there already is the eventlog source displayed, we return the same filter
                    if (!isNone(elEvents[0]) && get(filter, 'title') === elEvents[0].name) {
                        set(controller, 'titleFilter', get(filter, 'title'));
                        set(controller, 'descriptionFilter', get(filter, 'filter'));
                        return [get(filter, 'filter')];
                    }
                    // if not, we have to remove the old source before
                    else {
                        controller.removeEventLog();
                        set(controller, 'titleFilter', get(filter, 'title'));
                        set(controller, 'descriptionFilter', get(filter, 'filter'));
                        return [get(filter, 'filter')];
                    }
                }
                else {
                    return [];
                }
            },

            /**
             * Format the eventLog count for fullCalendar
             * @method getEventsLogCount
             * @param {number} count: integer that represents the count of events log relative to the given
             * @param {object} date: object that contains a 'begin' timestamp attribute and a 'end' timestamp attribute
             * @return {object}
             */
            getEventsLogCount: function (count, date) {
                var title = '';
                if ( count > 100) {
                    title = [' ', get(this, 'titleFilter'), ': more than 100'].join('');
                }
                else {
                    title = [' ', get(this, 'titleFilter'), ': x' + count].join('');
                }
                return {
                    type: 'eventlog',
                    title: title,
                    start: moment(get(date, 'begin')*1000).format(),
                    end: moment(get(date, 'end')*1000).format(),
                    allDay: true
                };
            },

            actions: {
                /**
                 * Redirect on the description view with relative event and filter
                 * @method onClickeventlog
                 * @param {object} calEvent fullcalendar event
                 * @param {object} jsEvent Javascript catched event
                 */
                onClickeventlog: function (calEvent, jsEvent) {
                    void(jsEvent);
                    var filter = this.formatFilterForWidgetList(calEvent.start);
                    this.goToInfo(filter, calEvent);
                }
            }

        });

        application.register('mixin:calendarsourceeventslog', mixin);
    }
});
